regex.op: Panel %02s Branch %02s Real Power Demand Block

Panel %02s Meter %02s Real Power Demand Block Peak
Panel %02s Meter %02s Real Power Demand Rolling
Panel %02s Meter %02s Real Power Demand Rolling Peak

name.inactiveText: High Current Alarm Phase A Cleared

description.activeText: (\d+)\.(\d+)Panel %02s Meter %02s High Current Alarm Phase A.
